actions.text: Amendment SA 803, under the order of 5/7/13, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 32. Record Vote Number: 116.

Amendment SA 803 proposed by Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 799. (consideration: CR S3223-3227, S3227-3228) To create the National Endowment for the Oceans to promote the protection and conservation of United States ocean, coastal, and Great Lakes ecosystems.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 803, under the order of 5/7/13, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 32. Record Vote Number: 116.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 803, under the order of 5/7/13, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 32. Record Vote Number: 116.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 803 proposed by Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 799.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To create the National Endowment for the Oceans to promote the protection and conservation of United States ocean, coastal, and Great Lakes ecosystems.
